name: Primary Button
description: Primary action button with brand colors
css: .btn { padding: {{spacing-md}} {{spacing-lg}}; border: none; border-radius: {{radius-md}}; font-weight: 500; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease; } .btn-primary { background: {{color-primary}}; color: {{color-background}}; } .btn-primary:hover { background: {{color-primary-600}}; transform: translateY(-1px); } .btn-primary:active { transform: translateY(0); }
jsx: export function Button({ children, className = '', ...props }) { return ( <button className={`btn btn-primary ${className}`} {...props}> {children} </button> ); }
preview: <!DOCTYPE html><html><head><style>.btn { padding: 12px 24px; border: none; border-radius: 6px; font-weight: 500; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease; } .btn-primary { background: #3b82f6; color: white; }</style></head><body><button class="btn btn-primary">Primary Button</button></body></html>
